author: alexdma
msg: - OntologyProvider now uses generics instead of Object (STANBOL-332)

- getOntologies(true) implementation in AbstractOntologyCollectorImpl is now possible, although instead of providing the closure it merges the closure of each managed ontology with the ontology itself (TODO preserve separate ontologies). (STANBOL-332)
- Implemented simpler version of getFromOntonet() method in reasoners.web (calls getOntologies(true) among other things) (STANBOL-250)

author: marvin
msg: Declare Lemon routines in common spot.
The files generated by Lemon do not include a header which provides forward
declarations for its functions.  Previously these declarations have been
jammed in as needed.  Now, we declare them in one place, and ensure that they
always have the __cplusplus include guards so that we get correct symbol
